article.title: Status and history for [mlt]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Many corrections, thanks to Thomas Pace and the National Council for the Maltese Language (www.kunsilltalmalti.gov.mt).
Albrecht Dreiheller signals some obvious problems (e.g. the use of ŕ and ů).
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
